duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and coordinate various aspects of food production process.
Identify and develop improvement processes and write SOPs under management direction.
Assist with implementation of new production systems and oversee employee training.
Provide leadership and hands-on support to ensure efficient production and employee safety.
Monitor and document trends, reports, and production sheets.
Serve as the liaison of information between shifts and support leaders with equipment and supplies.
Present general training to line employees.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent; relevant certifications or training is a plus
